- I can vouch for Charlie and Dave's early game activities as I saw them completing actual tasks

I haven't seen any suspicious behavior from the players I've encountered, but I've been alone in many areas of the ship for extended periods. Has anyone seen anything suspicious in other areas?

- I later saw Alice in Lower Engine, and she moved to Electrical. That was the last time I saw her
- Dave and Charlie were with me in Weapons for several rounds, and I can confirm Charlie was doing legitimate tasks there (calibrating targeting system)
- Erin's claim about seeing Charlie and Alice in Communications seems odd, as I never saw Charlie go there during my movements through the ship
- I think we should focus on where exactly Alice's body was found and who had access to that area
I find it strange that Erin claims to have seen Charlie and Alice in Communications when I was with Charlie in Weapons during that time, so someone here isn't telling the truth.
